ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Dragons (was: The Hole is now live... (Patch messag e)
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually: Level 53 and above who attack either dragon get punted to the edge of the zone now.  Several people from one of the higher level guilds on Saryrn
ygData.messageBody:
Actually:

Level 53 and above who attack either dragon get punted to the edge of the
zone now. Several people from one of the higher level guilds on Saryrn were
talking about it tonight.

Haven't heard if this happens if they buff/heal people fighting. If you can
buff/heal safely then bards, clerics, shaman won't be much affected since
their primary roles are heals/buffs/resists rather than raw combat.

Lyrnia

> I wonder if the coding they have that prevents spells from
> working on higher
> level mobs was somehow used here. Just a thought, but it would be nice of
> them if a weaker dragon simply dodged everything a 53+ player
> swung/cast/throw at them. Kinda takes away from role-playing if you can
> kill a tougher dragon, but get death touched by a weaker one.
>
> But there I go again using the R-P word. I might get banned for this if I
> keep it up. ;^)
>
> Peace
> Evulia, twinked out and still stalled at 11, Tunare
>
> > Hmm, I wonder exactly what this means? Will they banish the higher
> > levels? Port them away? Maybe kind of like a DT? I don't think I
> > quite understand this, well, we'll see what happens when someone
> > tries it... heh.
> >
> > ~Beatdrop
> >
